Articles.Content:
Heyho!

Today i found a great video! It shows how mars developed in the last billions of years.

At the beginning, the mars looks a bit like earth. But as time passes by the oceans disappear and it becomes the red look like today.

I hope you enjoy!
I hope that one day we would be able to run time in reverse, to reintroduce life to this dead world.

I hope that one day we would be able to run time in reverse, to reintroduce life to this dead world.

Too bad we'd be unborn and we'd go far back enough to the point where there was likely no life on earth before it would happen... Oh wait, you didn't want the whole universe running in reverse. Ah, that would work, if we did find a way.
The only way to revive Mars as a whole would be to melt the core and get it spinning. Until then all life is forced underground or ( hopefully ) in the future under biodomes.
